name: Telnet Sv Telesign
title: Java SE
summary: Telnet SV Telesign is a Java SE-based program built with javax.swing, designed to control and monitor alarm systems on telecom equipment using the Telnet protocol.
explain:
Telnet SV Telesign is a Java SE-based program built with javax.swing, designed to control and monitor alarm systems on telecom equipment using the Telnet protocol.

The program utilizes a multithreaded architecture to handle multiple concurrent sessions with telecom equipment and employs structured, modular programming to maximize performance and maintainability.

Project features :

- Manage the station on the custom map

- Manage users (multi-permission)

- Manage the alarm system and type

- Communicate with the device by telnet over a limited internal network

- Communicate with the MYSQL database

- Record full and custom logs and export them

This program is currently used in the Mazandaran Telecommunication Company.
